review: not as many movies as I thought there would be and a lot of the ones that ARE there to rent or buy you can find elsewhere for free.
author: Diane

review: The Fire Stick & remote are great! I could do without the 5-minute forced tutorial. There should be a way to bypass it. The associated iPhone app is horrible.
author: Doula Mom

review: I am using the fire stick at a condo in Hawaii. It set up and is streaming without any problems. It with the power cord fits in a small sandwich Bag for travel. Amazon prime while traveling.
author: Medicare Bill

review: Easy install and setup. It works well. I am happy!
author: James M Eways

review: I have only had this for two weeks but so far its great. Easy setup and use. Picture quality is very good on my old flat screen tv.
author: M. Lewis "IT Guy"

review: I'm totally in love with this product but I wish there was a way to stream local tv like Chromecast allows. The quality and speed of the Fire TV  Stick is amazing, it's just missing content.
author: Russel

review: Family really enjoys the Fire Stick.
author: Todd Ford
